text: لكم فيها منفع الى اجل مسمى ثم محلها الى البيت العتيق

translations.translation: You can make use of the sacrificial animals until a specified time, and then their place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
, There are advantages for you in these (cattle) up to a time, then their place is the ancient House for sacrifice.
You may derive benefit (from sacrificial animals) until an appointed time. Thereafter their place (of sacrifice) is near the Ancient House.
There are benefits for you in the (sacrificial offerings) of God until the appointed time when you slaughter them as your offering near the Ancient House.
In the cattle are benefits for you up to a fixed time and then they are to be brought to the Free House.
In them are benefits for you for an appointed term, and afterwards they are brought for sacrifice to the `Atiq House.
You have advantages in them till a fixed time, then their place of sacrifice is the Ancient House.
There are things therein profitable to you unto a stated term; thereafter their lawful place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
Therein are benefits for you for an appointed term; and afterward they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House.
You may benefit from the animals for an appointed time. Then they must be sacrificed at the Ancient House.
For you in them are benefits for a term appointed, and thereafter the destination is toward the ancient House.
You may benefit from them until a specified time. Then their place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
In them ye have benefits for a term appointed: in the end their place of sacrifice is near the Ancient House.
In them (cattle offered for sacrifice) are benefits for you for an appointed term, and afterwards they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House (the Haram - sacred territory of Makkah city).
In them, you have benefits until an appointed time. After their place of sacrifice is at the Ancient House.
In them are benefits for you until a certain time. Then their place is by the Ancient House.
For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.

[22:33] You may benefit from them, such as riding on them and carrying your loads on them in a way that does not harm them, until a specified time, the time for its immolation. Thereafter its lawful sacrifice, that is, the site where its immolation becomes due, is by the Ancient House, meaning, the entire [Meccan] Sanctuary.

(Therein) in the cattle (are benefits for you) benefits in riding them and drinking their milk (for an appointed term) until they are garlanded and designated for immolation in the pilgrimage; (and afterward they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House) if this is a lesser pilgrimage, and they are brought for sacrifice to Mina during the greater pilgrimage.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى } فالمنافعُ: شِربُ ألبانِهَا، وجَزُّ أَوبارِها، ورُكوبُ ظُهورِها
 والأَجلُ المُسمَى: إلى أنْ تُسمى بُدنا

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { لَكُمْ } أيها المؤمنون الناسكون بمناسك الحج { فِيهَا } أي: في الهدايا والضحايا { مَنَافِعُ } درها وصوفها وشعرها وظهرها ونسلها { إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى } أي: إلى حلول وقتٍ عيّنه سبحانه لذبحها { ثُمَّ } بعدما قرب وقتها، وحان حينها { مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَىٰ ٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ } [الحج: 33] أي: محل ذبحها عند البيت العتيق؛ أي: جميع الحرم حواليه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لكم فيها منافع } من الركوب عند الحاجة، ولبنها عند الضرورة، { إِلى أجل مسمى } إلى أن تُنحر
 ومن قال: شعائر الله: مواضع الحج، فالمنافع: التجارة فيها والأجر، والأجل المسمى: الرجوع إلى مكة لطواف الإفاضة
 { ثم مَحِلُّها } منتهية { إِلى البيت العتيق } ، قال ابن جزي: من قال: إن الشعائر الهدايا، فمحلها موضع نحرها، وهي مِنى ومكة
 وخصّ البيت بالذكر لأنه أشرف الحرم، وهو المقصود بالهدي
 و " ثم " ، على هذا، ليست للترتيب في الزمان لأن محلها قبل نحرها، وإنما هي لترتيب الجمل
 ومن قال: إن الشعائر مواضع الحج، فمحلها مأخوذ من إحلال المحرم، أي: آخر ذلك كله: الطواف بالبيت، أي: طواف الإفاضة إذ به يحل المحرم
 هـ
 أي: محل شعائر الحج كلها تنتهي إلى الطواف بالبيت، طواف الإفاضة
 ومثله في الموطأ
